They actually acquired explosive devices, IEDs that they then wrapped in shrapnel and they tested them because they wanted to make sure they would do maximum human damage.  When you have the president of this all started, Steph, let's remember on April 17th of this year, When Donald Trump tweeted out his command, his directive in all caps, liberate Michigan, what did we see days later?  We saw these weak, pathetic, armed gunmen.  If you're strong, if you're confident, you don't need to carry long guns around.
